compatibility_statement.summary: All packet readiness reports are status=ready, but full sign-off remains blocked until G2 failures are fixed and packet-002 final evidence pack parity with peer packets is resolved.

security_posture_summary.runtime_policy: strict/hardened split with fail-closed handling for unknown or incompatible semantics
notes: No new hostile-input regressions were observed before the drill stopped.
Security/adversarial gates (G4/G5) were not executed because G2 failed first.

blockers.title: Workflow scenario contract fixtures are out of sync with test-contract expectations
blockers.evidence: Unsupported workflow kinds (dtype_fixture_case, rng_fixture_case) and unknown fixture links during G2.
blockers.mitigation: Align workflow_scenario_corpus fixture kinds and differential/adversarial fixture IDs with test_contracts validators; rerun G2 then full topology drill.

blockers.title: RaptorQ conformance bundle durability artifacts are stale
blockers.evidence: conformance_bundle_v1 sidecar hash/size mismatch and stale scrub/decode proof signatures during G2.
blockers.mitigation: Regenerate conformance_bundle_v1 sidecar/scrub/decode-proof artifacts and verify hash alignment before rerunning the drill.

blockers.title: Packet-002 lacks final evidence pack artifact
blockers.evidence: FNP-P2C-002 readiness is ready, but final_evidence_pack.json is absent while peer packets provide one.
blockers.mitigation: Generate packet-002 final evidence pack artifact or codify approved exception policy with explicit waiver metadata.

packet_follow_up_actions.follow_up_gate: bd-23m.11 readiness drill + packet-I residual risk review

next_actions: Fix RDY-001 and RDY-002, then rerun scripts/e2e/run_ci_gate_topology.sh.
Resolve RDY-003 before final readiness sign-off closure.
After green rerun, publish explicit compatibility/security sign-off update in bd-23m.11 thread.
